1.title: Batman and Catwoman's First Kiss

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: The Cat and the Bat may be one of the biggest couples in the DCU, but their relationship dates all the way back to 1940's BATMAN #3. Check out Batman and Catwoman's first kiss in this Valentines Day edition of DC Tales From The Vault.

2.title: Superman and Lois Lane's First Kiss

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: When you think of Super Hero love, you think of DC's first couple - Superman and Lois Lane. Revisit the pair's first kiss in this Valentines Day edition of DC Tales From The Vault.

3.title: Wonder Woman's First Kiss

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Wonder Woman is in charge of her own love. Discover Diana and Steve Trevor's first kiss in this special Valentines Day edition of DC Tales From The Vault.

4.title: Action Comics #1 Torn Covers

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Would you tear off the cover of ACTION COMICS #1? Plenty of readers in 1938 did. Dive into the DC vault to learn why as DC celebrates ACTION COMICS #1000 and Superman's 80th anniversary.

5.title: Zatara

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Anybody looking for a master magician? Before the release of ACTION COMICS #1000, take a trip to the DC Vault and revisit the first appearance of Zatara in ACTION COMICS #1.

6.title: Tex Thomson

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Tex Thomson brought plenty of adventure to ACTION COMICS #1. Revisit the character's transformation into Mr. America and the Americommando of #ACTION1000.

7.title: Lois Lane

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: With over 4,700 appearances in comics worldwide, few characters are as iconic as Lois Lane. Enter the DC Vault and brush up on her comic book history.

8.title: Superman's First Appearance

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Visit the DC Vault for an inside look at the historic issue of Action Comics #1, including 6 pages that were originally cut from the Man of Steel's first appearance.

9.title: MAD Magazine - Part I

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Wait a minute, MAD Magazine wasn't always a magazine?. We're celebrating the relaunch of MAD with a trip to the DC Vault and a look at the original comic that started it all.

10.title: Booster Gold

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Ready to travel through time? We're headed back to the past for a look at BOOSTER GOLD #1, Batman's earliest time-hopping adventure. Special guest Batman Group Editor Jamie Rich.

11.title: MAD Magazine - Part II

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: So, what's the real reason MAD Magazine transitioned from a comic book to magazine format? Find out as we look at the early days of MAD in the latest episode of DC Tales From The Vault.

12.title: PLOP! Magazine

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: There's no series in DC's history as unusual as PLOP. Learn about the origins behind the horror-humor comic in the latest installment of DC Tales From The Vault.

13.title: Plastic Man

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Plastic Man's history stretches all the way back to the Golden Age of Comics. Explore the history of the hilarious hero in the latest installment of DC Tales From The Vault.

14.title: Cancelled Comics Cavalcade

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: There have been TONS of comics throughout the history of DC, and even when a series ends, it's never completely forgotten. Dive into the DC Vault for a very special look at the CANCELLED COMICS CAVALCADE.

15.title: The Batmobile

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: What's your favorite version of the Caped Crusader's car? Visit the DC Vault for a look at the Batmobile from the '60s BATMAN TV series in the latest installment of DC Tales From The Vault.

16.title: Heroes in Crisis

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: The traumatic events in Super Hero stories can reverberate with readers for generations. Ahead of HEROES IN CRISIS #1, explore some of Batman, Superman and Wonder Woman's most pivotal moments in this installment of #DCTalesFromTheVault.

17.title: Primal Age

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: Put on your battle armor and grab your weapons, because in the latest episode of #DCTalesFromTheVault we're diving into the sword and sorcery genre - including a special look at the abandoned PRIMAL AGE toy line and Marv Wolfman comic.

18.title: Horror Comics

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: DC's legacy of horror comics stretches all the way back to 1935. Take a rare look at some of our earliest horror creations in this installment of #DCTalesFromTheVault.

1.title: Kamandi

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: DC librarian Benjamin LeClear takes you inside the hardest room to access in DC and reveals the secrets of Jack Kirby's original KAMANDI.

2.title: Golden Age Superwoman Ashcan

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: The process of creating comics doesn't always happen the way you think it does. DC librarian Benjamin LeClear reveals secrets within a Golden Age SUPERWOMAN ashcan.

3.title: The Origin of Nth Metal

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Did you know Nth Metal was originally called Ninth Metal? Join Benjamin LeClear as he delves into the the comic book element that eventually led to DC Metal.

4.title: Doomsday Clock

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Think you know WATCHMEN? Benjamin Le Clear reveals some posters and prints you probably haven't seen on DC Tales From The Vault.

5.title: New Comics #1

episode of.title: DC Tales from the Vault (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Transport back to 1935. In the latest DC Tales From The Vault, Benjamin Le Clear revisits NEW COMICS #1, which included early work by the first ever female comics creator, Emma C. McKean.

imdb.title: DC Tales from the Vault
akas: DC Tales from the Vault (United States)
plot: DC Comics' Librarian Benjamin Le Clear takes you on a journey of discovery of fun and fascination with interesting tidbits about DC's characters, stories, and the people behind them.
